title: Day Two at Schwab Impact 2017 in Chicago
itunes:title: Day Two at Schwab Impact 2017 in Chicago
description:
Kim Laughton, President of Schwab Charitable, discusses a potential record-breaking year for U.S. philanthropy. David Kudla, CEO/CIO at Mainstay Capital Management, explains why he is shorting Tesla. Jeff Kleintop, Chief Global Investment Strategist at Charles Schwab, on 5 reasons investors should give thanks. Tony Davidow, Alternative Beta/Asset Allocation Strategist at Schwab Center for Financial Research, talks about the growth of strategic beta. And Carol and Cory hit the "Movers and Shakers on Wall Street" and Dave Wilson's "Stock of the Day." 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
